reviewText: I've been watching this show on the RTN network, but had never seen how the show started until I ordered this video. It's all here - David Banner's wife, who dies tragically in an auto accident: how Banner discovered the hidden strength he was looking for - and how that strength turned him into a monster; and the persistent, and annoying Jack McGee from the National Register. It could've easily been a spoof, a joke, but what makes it work is Bill Bixby's sensitive portrayal of David Banner - a kind, gentle, but ultimately tortured man.
